name: Sunny
title: Solar Flare
description: A curious solar flare who travels through space and causes beautiful auroras on Earth!
spaceWeatherImpact: I create beautiful auroras but can also disrupt satellites and power grids.
challenges: Sometimes I'm too energetic and cause problems
People don't always understand my effects
story: Hi! I'm Sunny, a solar flare from the Sun. I travel 93 million miles to reach Earth and create amazing light shows called auroras!

name: Alex Chen
title: Astronaut
description: An astronaut living on the International Space Station, experiencing space weather firsthand.
spaceWeatherImpact: Solar storms can expose me to dangerous radiation. I must seek shelter in the station's radiation protection area.
story: I'm Alex, an astronaut on the ISS. When solar storms hit, I see beautiful auroras but must protect myself from radiation!

name: Maria Rodriguez
title: Farmer
description: A modern farmer who relies on GPS technology for precision planting and harvesting.
spaceWeatherImpact: Solar storms disrupt my GPS systems, making it impossible to plant crops in precise rows or harvest efficiently.
challenges: GPS signal loss during planting season
Delayed harvests due to navigation issues
story: I'm Maria, a farmer in Iowa. When solar storms disrupt GPS, my tractors can't navigate properly, affecting my entire harvest!

name: Captain James
title: Commercial Pilot
description: An experienced pilot who navigates long-distance flights across the Atlantic Ocean.
spaceWeatherImpact: Solar storms cause radio blackouts and GPS disruptions, forcing me to use backup navigation methods.
challenges: Increased radiation exposure at high altitudes
story: I'm Captain James, flying across the Atlantic. Solar storms can cut off my radio contact with air traffic control!

name: Sarah Kim
title: Aurora Photographer
description: A photographer who specializes in capturing the Northern Lights and space weather phenomena.
spaceWeatherImpact: Solar storms create the most spectacular auroras, but they can also disrupt my camera equipment and communication devices.
challenges: Equipment malfunctions during strong solar activity
story: I'm Sarah, an aurora photographer in Alaska. Solar storms create amazing light shows, but they can also mess with my camera gear!

name: Mike Thompson
title: Power Grid Engineer
description: An engineer responsible for maintaining the electrical power grid during space weather events.
spaceWeatherImpact: Geomagnetic storms can induce currents in power lines, potentially causing blackouts and damaging transformers.
story: I'm Mike, a power grid engineer. When solar storms hit, I work around the clock to prevent blackouts across the city!
